info.name: Planar Approx Schwarz P Layer
info.description:
An C0 continuous surface constructed of PLANAR quadrilaterals aligned in a grid (using voxel ray-casting for acceleration).
Approximating layer of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Schwarz_minimal_surface#Schwarz_P_(%22Primitive%22)]Schwarz P[/url] surf.
